properties.areaDesc: Southeast Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Northwest Pocahontas
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:05PM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet
accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to
two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph in the
afternoon.

* WHERE...Southeast Randolph, Northwest Pocahontas and Southeast
Pocahontas Counties.

* WHEN...From 5 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Power outages are
possible due to ice and wind, particularly in the higher
elevations.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start as snow or a mix
before changing to freezing rain midday Saturday. A change to
rain is expected by early evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for potential
power outages.

Additional information can be found at
https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and
Twitter pages.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY
